home.title: Embark on a coding journey with me!
home.description: Discover compelling articles covering a variety of programming topics, providing valuable insights from fundamentals to advanced concepts.

about.devops: I possess a comprehensive understanding of containerization and Kubernetes, primarily from a developer's perspective. Additionally, my expertise is validated by a CKAD certificate, affirming my practical experience in this domain.
about.frontend: I have robust technical skills in front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Proficient in crafting responsive and visually appealing user interfaces, my expertise ensures a superior user experience through a strong foundation in design principles and functionality.
about.backend: Focused on backend development, I bring extensive experience as a Java and Scala developer, adept at designing and implementing robust solutions. My proficiency in these technologies reflects a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions in backend development.
